title: How Winter Storm Fern Slowed Down the Bitcoin Network
full_text: How Winter Storm Fern Slowed Down the Bitcoin Network. When an immutable blockchain meets unstoppable force of nature.. The Bitcoin network hashrate, which is the amount of computing power that is pointed at the crypto network, saw a massive decline over the weekend, falling from just over 1,000 exahashes per second o… [+5001 chars]
